snippet: President Obama’s handling of the prisoner exchange has renewed frustration among congressional Democrats about the administration’s relations with its allies on Capitol Hill.
abstract: Washington Memo; Pres Obama's handling of Bergdahl prisoner exchange renews frustration among congressional Democrats about administration's relations with its allies on Capitol Hill, prompting criticism that White House failed to prepare lawmakers for fallout from the politically explosive case.

byline.contributor: Jackie Calmes contributed reporting from Chicago.

lead_paragraph: President Obama’s handling of the prisoner exchange has renewed frustration among congressional Democrats about the administration’s relations with its allies on Capitol Hill.

headline.main: Democrats Are Weary in Wake of Bergdahl Case
headline.print_headline: P.O.W. Case Adds Strain to Party’s Faith in Obama

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
